comments: From a(2) onwards, all terms are divisible by 9. - _Alonso del Arte_, Apr 04 2014
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
maple: a:= n-> (s-> parse(cat(s[-i]$i=1..length(s))))(""||(3^n)):seq(a(n), n=0..50);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Apr 09 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: More terms from _Eric M. Schmidt_, Apr 04 2014
